document.full_text: president barack obama is being criticized for the aggressive air strikes against libya, but the real political risk for him will come if, a year from now, col. muammar el-qaddafi still rules libya.
document.title: letter from washington: libya action creates risks for obama
lines_and_colors: president barack obama is being criticized for the aggressive air strikes against libya, but the real political risk for him will come if, a year from now, col. muammar el-qaddafi still rules libya.
